verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: had] [ARG1: kind words for his mom] [ARGM-TMP: on Mother ’s Day] , but he conspicuously failed to mention any of the mothers of his children .
President Trump had kind words for his mom on Mother ’s Day , but [ARG1: he] [ARGM-MNR: conspicuously] [V: failed] [ARG2: to mention any of the mothers of his children] .
